text:
Hi Jon  :raised_hands:
Some images i need to use in template like icons/illustrations in parts non-editable by users from my company =/
thanks anyway :blush:
Understood. What i meant was upload the non webp version. HubSpot automatically converts to webp if the users browser supports it. If it doesn't support it the user gets the non webp version

oh yes, now I understand.
the template files are also converted right? I thought that only the images in the file uploader were converted.
Thanks for explaining Jon
